attributes.action: Save our traditional, respectful, historical, honourable songs at the Proms!
attributes.additional_details: Simple respect normal indigenous British heritage of loved traditional inspirational British songs! A huge % of the population apart from the woke, Antifa, & BLM groups believe this is our heritage, our history! This cannot be ignored! These songs will be sung regardless at the Governments pain should you not support to keep these historic songs in place ! Please stop this nonsense at your peril!
attributes.background: I would wish that the British government and parliament elect please respect our common respect for our history and heritage, keep all songs normally sung and loved during the proms shown mainly on BBC, this is an historic to the indigenous population of the Uk!

rejection.details:
Decisions about the BBC Proms are a matter for BBC, which is operationally independent, not the Government or House of Commons.

You can read the BBC's announcement of the programme for the Last Night of the Proms here: https://www.pressparty.com/pg/newsdesk/BBC1/view/223541/
